name: Pool Ladder
description: A simple Django app to track matches in a pool ladder tournament

LADDER_NAME.description: The name of your Pool Ladder. This is displayed on the site header.

SECRET_KEY.description: The Django secret key used for secure signing. Keep this secret.

DEBUG.description: Set this to `true` to enable debugging. Ensure this is `false` in production.

AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID.description: Key ID for AWS identity with S3/SES iAM permissions.

AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY.description: Secret Key for AWS identity with S3/SES iAM permissions.

AWS_STORAGE_BUCKET_NAME.description: S3 Bucket name to use for static files storage.

FROM_EMAIL.description: Email address that site mail comes from. leave blank to disable email.

SLACK_WEBHOOK_URL.description: Slack Webhook for notifying a slack channel. https://api.slack.com/incoming-webhooks
